key_phrases: I haven't heard of most of these
having your own website would be helpful on the city page
find right away on the home page without having to click a lot of links
one stop shop for grants, artist information, upcoming events
teaming up with museum or venue newsletters
solutions_proposed: create a dedicated website or webpage on the city page
feature the site on the home page for easy access
provide a one stop shop for grants, artist information, and events
partner with museum or venue newsletters to promote programs
